channel.title: Vikings vs Saints
channel.description:
Saints cheated, didn't they?
No way Brees > Brett.

item.title: Vikings vs Saints
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:8, topic:327096”][quote author=Tenen link=topic=423490.msg3116993#msg3116993 date=1265082628]

Football sucks, waste of time. Its the only way to have a bad day from something that wouldn’t even effect you if you didnt put so much effort into nothing.

effort? into watching a game? …
we loose, I eat some chips, we win, I still eat some chips–no mood changes either since it wasn’t me who sucked.
[/quote]
You sat there for hours watching grown men play with a ball, why not do something productive?[/quote]Yeah, hanging on moparisthebest is way more productive!

item.title: Vikings vs Saints
item.dc:creator: @Quatrain Quatrain
item.description:
@Quatrain wrote:

I’m from Minnesota. It sucked. Bad. 1998 all over again… I’m beginning to wonder if the Vikings will ever win a super bowl.

Read full topic

item.title: Vikings vs Saints
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

It was a bad game. First off, Adrian Peterson needs to fucking hold onto the ball in key situations. Secondly, the refs need to stop being paid by the Saints due to 2 absolutely bullshit calls in OT. Clearly he did not have possession of the ball due to being absolutely wrecked by the Vikings defense. The PI call on the Vikings was retarded; the ball was clearly out of reach and both players fell in an attempt to get it. How is that PI? Brees overall did not deserve to win the game in the end, but fumbles will come back to haunt you. It was Favre’s game from the start, and that’s the way it should’ve stayed.

Read full topic
